component.name: VidTool
component.summary: Video processing and batch reencoding tool

description.p: VidTool is a comprehensive video processing application that provides both a modern wxPython-based GUI and a command-line interface for batch video processing, reencoding, and management tasks.

ul.li: Browse and select directories containing video files
View detailed information about each video (resolution, codecs, streams)
Batch select and process multiple videos
Reencode videos with customizable options (codec, CRF, etc.)
Column sorting and live filtering with regex support
Play videos directly from the interface
